content.detailedDescription:
At about 530 p.M.I went out jogging in my neighborhood, which is quite rural and quite dark.  i observed a bright object in the southern sky - unable to tell the distance.  i watched it for a good 30-40 minutes.  
there were two red lights on its perimeter that appeared to be part of it.  these were at the 9:00 - 3:00 positions, and would move to the 12:00 - 6:00 positions.  they would stop and then go back the other way.  

i observed the object as it appeared to drop down in an extremely rapid southern movement then return to the original position.  this happened only once during the period of observation. 

i returned to my residence, got a pair of 8-power binoculars, and observed the object through them.  i could not make out any more details.  

i went back out at about 8:30 p.M. and the object was gone.
content.summary: Very bright star-looking object with very discernible red lights around it.

content.detailedDescription: I did not see object at the time, it wasn't till i was down loading to pc i noticed object over umbrella. my computer photo program is older i thought that maybe you could make image clearer.. thank you carolyn kinney
content.summary: Panama city fl.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were leaving the house. i went out front door she had not come out yet. i looked to the west towards i 79 as i started down the steps at our house. i saw a gray thing sitting in the sky about a 1/4 mile from my position. watched it for a moment and turned went back to door and yelled at her to grab camera. she had gone into basement to exit through our garage. i stepped to get camera came out and it was there for a moment then moved west in an instant it was gone. i retired from the us air force in 2005 and know my aircraft on sound signature as well as visual recognition. i have never seen anything like this. 
 i recently did some checking on web sites  to see if anyone else had seen this. one article i read said a retired army person in the same area had pictures. so i thought i would contact someone and they gave me the link to this web site to report it. i now have my camera with me all the time.
content.summary: Gray silver object 1/4 mile away over housing development, seven field pa

content.detailedDescription: I had a paper route in the early 1980s i was early teens maybe 12 or 13 i guess,i was doing my regular paper route in the dogwood section of levittown, pa i usually took a break on daffodil lane when i was about half way done my paper route so i stopped around 5 in the morning and i was just sitting there on my bike when a circular ufo just appeared above my head it came straight down from the clouds it stopped just over the street lights and it was perfectly round with all different colors on the bottom it didnt move but was  spinning really fast it lit up the whole neighborhood like it was daylight. it was only about maybe a 100 feet above the street lights it only stayed a few minutes and then it went straight up and disappeared in the night like it went into outerspace. i was kind of stunned i finally went and finished my paper route then i went home and went back to bed then i went to school and as the day went on i kinda forgot about it. as i was doing my paper route the next morning i stopped at my usual break spot on daffodil lane when i started thinking about the ufo so i sat there a few minutes when the ufo came back straight down from the sky it stopped instantly just above the street lights in the exact same spot and hieght above the street lights it lit up the neighborhood like daylight it didnt move kinda like it was held in place yet it was spinning insanely fast while the whole bottom was flashing different colors, it only stayed a few minutes then went straight up as afast as it came and it was gone. i was absolutly amazed i finished my paper route went home and told everybody in my famil and nobody believed me then i asked my mom if she could get mr=e a camera and she said no i wanted 1 incase it came back but she said film is expensive and you are not wasting film. so for about the next 2 weeks the ufo came back everymorning at the exact time to the minute and stopped in the exact same spot above my head at the exact same spot and it stayed for the same time the went straight back up and disappeared. i tried everyday to get my brother to go with me to see it but he said no because he thought i just wanted him to help do my paper route finally i convinced hi to go with me so  we did my route then stopped there around the time it usually came we sat and waited then at the exact time it came back again right over our heads and lit the neighborhood up and my brother freaked out he said omg you are telling the truth, it stayed a few minutes then went straight up and disappeared the next morning we both got up and di my route we stopped at the spot around the same time again but it didnt come back and never came back after that.. im 39 years old now so im guessing it was around 81,82 or 1983 in or around there im not sure how i would find out the exact year because i dont know if the courier times would have that information after so many years.........
content.summary: Saw ufo early mornings hours during paper route everyday for about 2 weeks.

content.detailedDescription: Driving with friend from gaithersgurg md to silver spring md noticed 2 star like objects one on top of each other in staight line.They were very bright, brighter than stars and alot lower.They didn't appear to move just hover.I told my friend and she said they were just stars,but she did say that they were very bright and lower than any stars shes seen.After a while she said that they had seem to move a little.This took her by surprised and then she stated she didnt know what they were.I had to be at work so i dont know how lond they were there for.Funny thing is, the the objects came out again the following 2 nights, same place same formation.I went to the mufon site on nov. 30 2008 @ 0700 hrs and noticed that i am not the only person to see these 2 objects.Something is happening in this area and id like to know what.Tonight i will be out with camcorder in hand.I hope to catch images of this event.
content.summary: 2 star like objects low in the night one on top of each other.

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were getting in the car to head to the grocery store at about 7:45 pm when my something caught his eye.  he said he saw something in the sky that was moving rather fast and began to coax me out of the car to take a look.  by the time i got out it was out of my view but i told him i would drive to a better area to take a look.  

i parked the car at the kiwanis park and got out with camera in hand.  we watched what my son thought was the fast moving light for about 15 minutes.  it was facing the east.  we both observed it flashing colors of red and blue.  i knew it stayed stationery because i found a cluster of stars in the sky and found the bright blinking star right under it.  we saw an airplane fly below it at some point. 

he and i took 5 photos and in two of them there is a strange round shape that i cannot explain.  at a glance it's barely visible but i was able to zoom in better with my photoshop program and could see that it's more of a clustered circle...Very strange.
content.summary: Star-like object flashing colored lights

content.detailedDescription: It was about 7:10 pm when i pulled into my driveway so my daughter could go inside and change. i was mindful of the time because she had to be at the movie theater at 7:30 pm. i noticed two orbs of bright white just over the hill i live next to. i didn't hear a noise when i got out of my car and didn't see any red or flashing lights like you would on typical aircraft i see all the time. after taking my daughter to the movie theater i was driving west on happy valley road to return home when i saw the same orbs but they were less bright and seem to be moving south and west. what struck me weird was if they were moving away from me why were they still only white and the fact that although they were moving, they were still seemingly the same formation in relation to each other.I also realized it was about a half hour later. i decided to head west and see if i could catch up to the objects. i couldn't, but i did call my parents who live 40 minutes west of me. they saw the lights south of where they live and also thought they were strange. they viewed the objects through binoculars and saw that the white orbs occasionally pulsated red on the bottom. one object was smaller and dimmer and higher in the sky compared to the other object. the objects continued to move southwest. after a half hour of driving i had to turn back, but i could still see those orbs in the distance. i realized that compared to other planes in the sky, these things were very big and very bright especially to be able to see them so far in the distance over an hour later. sorry i couldn't photograph it or video it. i wish i had time to investigate further but maybe someone has an answer for me.
content.summary: Two white light orbs one lower, bigger and brighter

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing outside of the house in tracy, ca. my dad just bought a house and i was  taking a brake from working on it. i was talking to my mom on the phone and watching the sky looking at the stars and watching all the airplanes fly by. i noticed this craft in the air and thought it was an airplane but noticed a frew seconds later the lighting was different. there were 3 big lights with a smaller one on top these lightings were on the bottom of the craft it looked some what like this:
                                                                       .
                                                                       o
                                                                      o o
                                                      
the 2 bottom larg lights are more together. i couldn't see the shape but i guessed it was a trianguler shape because the back of the crafts lights look like this: ....... starght in a row. both ends were light up and it blinked across. the craft look just a tiny bit closer to the ground from an air planes point of view. it was moving straghit as fast as a plane and had a noise that sounded like a plane but only a little noise. during the sighting i felt confused because i don't know what i saw. was my mind planing tricks on me and it was really an airplan? did the military make 
a craft? because it looked man made but felt like it had some alien technoligy to it. my action during the sighting i just stood still and watched it fly by. after the sighting i woundered around trying to think of an explaination. i lost sight 'cause it flew out of sight. i wanted to add to this description that there might of been more lights of what i can remember.
content.summary: 3 big lights on bottom with 1 little one and about 6 or more lights going across.

content.detailedDescription:
The date is approximate, but in the fall when i was either 17 or 18 (so 1987 or 1988) i was trying to go to sleep (i'm guessing 1987, based on that alone, as i would have been under stricter house rules) and heard, or more accurately, felt a deep thrumming noise.  my bed was under my window - i looked out, to the east, and there was a huge.. something.  the lights on whatever it was, maybe 5 to 7 of them, were roughly boomerang/chevron shaped, and massive.  i sat there listening to the thrum of the thing until i could work up the nerve to go downstairs to wake my parents up. neither really awoke (my mom said "go back to sleep, it's the ceiling fan") fully, so i was the only one that saw anything.  several months/maybe a year later, i felt vindicated by seeing a video on some "cops!" type show which was taken by a police officer from brewster, ny (just over the ct border) of the exact thing i'd seen, though i saw it much closer.  it was massive - maybe bigger than a football field - and terrifying in that it made a noise that you could feel, but not really hear.  if you've ever "thought" you heard a helicopter in the distance, but saw nothing, that's as close as i can describe the sound.  

it was also incredibly slow moving - too slow and entirely too quiet for its size.  it hovered just over the tree line, and i remember distinctly being filled with impending doom.  (actually, just typing this out made me wish i hadn't ever thought of that night again.)  it's a feeling that you've seen something you shouldn't have.  i almost forgot, the lights reconfigured briefly into an almost-cigar shape before it just glided away.

ironically, i've lived in the absolute middle-of-nowhere tx (er, near an air force base - so i've seen some funky, but clearly manmade things) for 16 years now and never once seen anything suspect (we have nothing but clear skies!) since that terrifying night.  here's the "oh, she's crazy, nevermind" part - i had a feeling that it was incredibly dangerous to me personally.  it was too big, too close, too quiet and (yeah) alien.  and it was right over my house.  but, no, not that crazy - no abduction story or anything, just a conviction that it wasn't manmade.  and it didn't care if i saw it or not.

and.. thanks for listening. i had no idea that the "hudson valley boomerang" existed before this odd google night tonight.
content.summary: Large ufo close (over treetops).

content.detailedDescription:
Numerous reports and photos of venus and jupiter... 
these are not ufo's!

p l a n e t s!!!

please look it up and verify it is not a ufo
however, it is extraordinary to behold, and is at its brightest till around dec 2nd
content.summary: Two lights are venus and jupiter. please look it up!

content.detailedDescription:
I first noticed two lights in formation in the sky while driving along the 80 around berkeley and emeryville. they caught my eye in the car despite all the traffic, although at the time i assumed they must be planes or helicopters momentarily appearing to by flying in sync.

i arrived home around 10 minutes later. after unpacking groceries i went to the upstairs window and noticed the same lights there. they were in the exact same formation, the top one offset about 20 degrees from the one on the bottom. they were by far the brightest thing in the sky.

i watched them for another ten minutes or so, waiting for some sign of one to change distance and angle from the other, but they remained locked.

i went and found a pair of binoculars and focused in on them. it was immediately clear that there were no signs of these being commercial aircraft of any kind, ie no blinking lights to speak of.

the light quality was luminescent and that of a planet when viewed through a high powered telescope, but there and visible to the naked eye in the haze of an urban environment.

i saw many aircraft fly by these lights, possibly investigating them. the lights were incidentally far brighter than these aircraft. the distance between the lights could have been anywhere between a thousand yards and a number of miles, it was hard to tell.

during the time i was viewing them, roughly 45 minutes, they disappeared down below objects in my foreground. my sense was that they were traveling in the opposite direction and thus sinking below the horizon.

i snapped a couple of pictures of the lights, one of which is attached. they all appear to show some kind of dark band around the brighter light on the bottom.
content.summary: Two hovering lights

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife went out side for cigarette and the skies were clear. all of a sudden she looked at me with excitement.She said to take off my bra and you can feel my mountains. i felt here left mountain and a ufo landed on here right mountain. soft landing for both of us.
content.summary: Ufos lands on my wifes mountains1

content.detailedDescription: The wizard of oz gang were traveling through the poppy fields and a flying object black in size was traveling at high speeds. the tin man looked up and said to dorothy thats the witch doing exercises. but the scarecrow said it could be the flying monkeys. so on the way their they made a report with wizard.
content.summary: Ufo flying over emerald city!

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home in my car, and where i live is a strip of parks; well in the middle driving i saw a bright flash in the sky over the parks, i didnt think much of it, but then it happened again, the flash was like a brilliant blue color, there were a thin layer of clouds, and at first i thought it was a helicopter, but i didnt hear anything, and then i thought it was lightning, but it was far too cold out, and then i just stopped driving and watched it for a couple of minutes. it was around 8pm. and the way that it moved was in a wierd patteren, and the light was above the clouds and it was massive. the feeling i had was i was just mezmorized, then a couple of days later, i finally told a famly member, and they had said that they recorded a show on ufo sightings, so i watched it and i felt shocked like wow, i really thought i was going out of my mind. i really wish that you help verify what i seen a few nights ago. 
         thankyou,
             lori strybuc
content.summary: Big bright flashing light, moving in different directions.

content.detailedDescription: It all started i was sitting in a restaurant at the maxim hotel and casino in las vegas nevada in 1981 a guy leans over to me and my wife and says do you believe in ufo.Shis name was bob lazar and im like sure and he starts telling me about a place outside las vegas nevada called area 51 id never heard of this place and starts telling me he worked their and tells me about spacecraft that the feds have hidden in this area after an intence chat for 3 hours he gave me a map and asked if he could hide in our room as the feds were trying to kill him you know the story he said they had erased his identy and  bob was trying to tell eveyone he said so it would be harder for the feds to kill him well just meeting this guy im like no you can;t come to our room i have one bit of info that you didnt see on the show on bob lazar this will make my story true he told me he had a bottle of fuel from the  craft at area 51 and they wanted it back (them and they) had broken into many peoples houses bob knew trying to find it do i know where it is i cant say as im scared for my own life from this guy  (the map got stolen from my house in nd )the map told me how to get their that night we drove out to the area (only on wednesday nights) he told us and we stopped in the desert in our van it was so dark you could not see your hand in front of your face it was about 10-20 miles from las vegas north on the interstate than go west  we sat their in the dark for about 1 min and got freeked out and left it had the feeling like someone was watching us we never did see the craftbut we were close to the spot he said  im sure you have heard all about this guy and i have seen the show on tv about himbob lazar years after this incounter with him after meeting him our lives were never the same as we found ourselves being followed not that we were looking for people folowing us but it just happened im here to tell ya that was weird cuz the guy that followed us was an albino i know it sounds crazy but its true and let me tell ya you notice an albino following you when you live in nd now years later   we were driving from colorado almost home in nd a friend was driving my van and i said check out that weird light <zed thats my friends name being tired and grumpy from to many miles driveing said thats an antenna no i said its to high he argued with me he said i can see the tower coming down nows it;s 2 am and it;s not to far out in a field real dark and i said no it doing somthing over that farm house just than it did a 180 with lights blazing and i said see that ain;t no tower as we kept driving down the interstate at 2 am in north dakota at 25 below zero you can stop on the interstate cuz their just isn;t any cars so i said stop stop and as it got closer it got real big and it was not stopping getting closer i said go go than stop stop we than opened the van doors and got out on the highway as it went over totally a freek show for sure it was no higher than a crop sprayer ,maybe 500 feet so it was no star type sighting it went over  us with a woosh and it was hugh it was like it wanted us to see it i had a pregnant wife in the van and the next thing we knew   we lost 3-4 hours and we were standing on the highway watching it go away but it did go away totally it was up around 500-1000 feet totally silent and just watched us i;d turn on the van lights and the craft would back off just floating their it was round in the front with windows all across the front like a ship you see on the ocean and the back came to a tip so it was not totally a diamond cuz of the front windows but it looked like a diamond if you get what i mean  we got back in the van and drove the last 10 miles home watching the sky and as we drove it followed us and flew down the golf course we were freeked out to the max it followed us home and sat outside the window to the south just hanging their watching us we got into the house and i hid behind the wall looking out the window and it just hung their even after day break you could see the star type light than it was gone it had a light on the front and a light on the back and it discuised itself as two stars but i could see the outline of the craft between the stars / lights one real werid thing was on the highway we all said we saw cars comming maybe two miles away and they never came and they never went by yet they were comming we all talked about that after it was over for days and now years my belief is that these craft belong to the feds they fly them around i believe they stole the technology from somewhere maybe roswell i don;t know but one thing is for sure when you see a craft like this your life will change and you will never be the same you cant go outside without watching the sky i actually bought a old farm house just to watch the sky the location of the sighting was mile mark 130 on interstate i-95 in north dakota
content.summary: Driving along not looking for a ufo but it happened.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home turn onto my street notice a light at end of street take off into space in a split second, left no light trail . it could have been farther than the end of street. witch is approximately 200 yards
content.summary: End of street ufo takes off.

content.detailedDescription:
Two bright objects in the sky, much brighter than any others, lined up, one almost directly over the other, and hung in the sky.  the lower one seemed to move away and then back towards me repeatedly, sometimes disappearing behind cloud cover but other times the light was so bright it pierced through the clouds (or it was below the cloud cover.)

the lights were so bright it seemed like tendrils were coming from it - those little spikes of light you get when looking at the sun.

i got out my telescope and looked at it closely.  i was able to gain no new details except that it looked round, a circle or sphere, and that it was many different colors.  it seemed to flash or pulsate red and yellow and all the colors in between.  it looked like it might have been spinning.

the light very suddenly vanished and has not yet returned.
content.summary: Two bright star like objects aligned over each other.  one seemed to move away and back closer repeatedly.

content.detailedDescription: Dinner was almost prepared, with the exception of grilling the steaks. i walked out onto the deck and removed the grill cover in prepartion of firing up the grill. while folding up the cover i gazed up into the night skies, as i usually do. now this was a very clear night with good star visibility. a bright moving object immediately caught my attention. it was proceeding in a north direction, but not very rapidly, as i compared it to stationary stars up above it. i focused very hard on this object and again immediately noticed it had no flashing markers on it as all aircraft do. i then started listening for some kind of engine exhaust but it was totally quite also. the thing that caught my curiousity the most was the color of this object. it was totally round in dimension from my point of view, but it had two very distinguishing colors to itself. it had an inner color, almost electric  blue. the color of blue you see if you hold a plug wire close to a spark plug and see the power jumping the distance, (while the engine is running.) this color was visible in a completely round circle on the inner side of this object. attached to this electric blue inner circle was an outer much smaller circle, completely around it too. this was probably one fourth of it's total size. now the color of this section was white with a bluish tint to it. i then realized i've never seen anything like this before, ever. meanwhile i had been holding the folded grill cover in my hands so i leaned over to place it down and immediately returned my gaze to this unusual object, because i intended on not losing my visual on it. now this only took about two seconds to do, but on looking back at the same area in the sky there was nothing there. no lights no nothing, it was suddenly gone. no cloud cover to interfere, as i could still see lots of stars wherever i looked. this object disappeared in a matter of seconds, no more than two at the very most. i regret deeply that i did that, because i would have then seen it disappear. but even now i still vividly remember how these colors stood out and seemed to glow from  this object.
content.summary: I gazed up into sky and spotted an unusual lighted object.

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming into my house from the back yard.  i looked up into the sky and noticed two very bright objects, what i thought were stars, but brighter than usual and not in the area of the sky where i have seen bright stars before.

i went into the house and asked my wife to come out and look and get her reaction.  she had the same as i.  we watched for awhile and then came in and ate dinner. about an hour and a half.

my wife went out to smoke and came back into the house to tell me that they had moved.  they had move much lower in the sky than a normal star would have moved in that time.

also we noticed that the lower object was blinking bright red and white.
my wife watched for about ten minutes and the lower object kept moving down on the horizon.  she also noticed that there seemed to be an airplane circleing around as if it were checking it out.  

after about twenty minutes it seem to disapear from sight behind the trees and roof tops.

we knew these were not stars, airplanes, or planets.  we are not sure what they were, but it just didn't seem normal.
content.summary: 2 bright stars never seen b 4 in this area of sky were noted...1pprox. 1 hr later after dinner they had moved significant distance to the west and then dissappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend is a hunter and his thermal camera took these pictures on 2 different nights.  the time stamp on both shows the exact time and date.  i watched ufo hunters this morning and was struck by the one "packman" light in the sky. (just before it cut to the vw commercial).  they are so similar that i went back & looked at his photos.  the one is strange; the white globe seems to be surrounding a black one right below it; shows some motion, i guess.  they creep me out because we live on the adjoining property and so they're really close to our house.  i did show them to a professional photographer and she said they aren't rain drops or lens flare but she didn't know what could produce  that effect....Esp. the packman white globe surrounding the black one.
i don't know how long they were there but if they lingered, the thermal camera would probably have kept shooting.
regardless of what you think they are, i'd sure like to know what you think.  could it be ball lightening?  seems odd there are so many in one spot and i never heard of ball lightening gobbling up black ones. or, could they be 'probes'?
i have a set i tossed into photoshop cs and pulled out more contrast and color but these are the originals.
the show this morning was " sightings over pennsylvania"; saturday, 11/28? or it could have been the 28th and it was a show that i t-voed.  i'm sure it will be easy for you to check..........
content.summary: Strange lights in the woods during this past august during the pa flap.

content.detailedDescription: My husband & i were outside having a cigarette and watching the sky because of the other sightings at about the same time. we were outside for about 10 minutes before i spotted it. it was about 30 degrees up in the sky and further south of us towards butte falls, lots smaller than the previous sightings. i had my husband keep an eye on it and ran in to grab my video camera and tell the kids. my son brought out the telescope and sighted it in, he said it looked like a star. we could see that it was moving west for a few minutes and then it exploded, as it did that you could barely see it with the eyes anymore, though we could see it falling or decending in the video camera and telescope. after we lost sight of it i had one of the kids go see what time it was and it was 4:43 pm. all we can tell everyones is to keep looking at the southern oregon sky between 4 and 5 pm, well look at the sky as much as possible anyways, no matter what time it is.
content.summary: Bright sphere in southern sky east of jupiter & venus (explodes).

content.detailedDescription:
My friend is a hunter and his themal camera, made by coach, took these night shots. the images were only shot from his camera since it was late at night and neither of us saw them. he emailed me the pictures to view and wondered what i thought.  it struck me as odd but who do you show them to?  a professional photographer looked at them & said they're not rain drops or lens flare but didn't know what they were. this morning i watched "u.F.O. hunters & noticed the one picture, right before the v.W. commercial & one of the lights in the sky looked exactly like the 'packman' light in the woods.  that's what got my attention; they were so similar. i guess the one picture of the packman white object, with the tentacles, surrounding what looks like a black ball below it is the best for detecting motion.  the pictures give me the creeps since i live on the adjoining property so they're really close to our house. i don't know how long they were there but i think the thermal camera would have kept shooting if they had lingered.
i don't care if you tell me they're soap bubbles; i'd just like to know what you think they are.  also, most of the pa. sightings were in bucks county,this happened during the period of the rash of sightings in our state.
 who sits and blows soap bubbles in the middle of the night & decided to go back a week later and do it again?  and that packman globe surrounding a black ball? who could explain that one?  notice the one ball in front of a tree in the background;  you can see the tree branch thru the ball.  had to all be generating heat or the camera would not have fired.

curious in pennsylvania..........
content.summary: Balls of light in the woods over 3 days all at the same location.

content.detailedDescription:
On nov 22 2008 i was driving home after driving my sister to her house i happened to look up in the sky and noticed yhis bright star likr thing then i noticed it was blinking red and blue and the white light getting brighter. i sat a little longer and noticed that it started moving real fast straight up and down. i hurried back to my mom house and picked her up and had her come with me she thought it was a plane but then she noticed it was moving in zig zag motions and there were like red dots floating along with it. 
then for the next 5 days i watched it every night and listened to everyone call me crazy then on nov 28 2008 my family noticed there are 2 of them and they are straight up abd down and they move closer to each other and get brighter at the same time they even move in the same motion. then around 10:30pm i was driving home from berrien springs going north and i noticed that the red blue and white lights looked as though they were descending down. every night they come out at the same time and they disappear around the same time. we also noticed that there are smaller ones all over the place and they look like they are attached together by a red looking string looking thing. 
i hope you can help me and let me know if this trully is a ufo or something else but i cant imagine it being anything else
content.summary: Looks like a star but it blinks red blue and white.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were on an off road camping trip north of death valley, on a jeep trail, north of route 266. after exploring mines in the area we prepared to settle down for the night. our typical routine was to gaze at the stars, before turning in. we were lying in our sleeping looking slightly to the south, when we saw two ultra bright flashes. the flashes occurred less than a half a second apart and had finger like sparks extending from the central point. about a second after the second flash, a spherical luminous object appeared in the vicinity of the flashes. it remained stationary for a couple of seconds and accelerated to the east.The object disappeared behind the hills to the east. the rate of travel was faster than any aircraft and was definitely not a meteor. i said to my wife " did you just see something " to which she replied , the above description. we discussed the event re describing it to each other, trying to figure out what we just saw. as far as speculating what we saw, it was as if something was entering our space through some sort of portal, just a guess.
content.summary: A luminous sphere, extreme high altitude, moving west to east, faster than any aircraft.

content.detailedDescription:
Till now, i still do not know what exactly was i saw ten years ago. when i was in high school, my classmates and i had a several-day outing in the country, a small village near dalian, china. one night, about 23:00 when all of us lied on the bed, looking out into the sky, talking, joking, suddently some one of us shouted out what a big and bright star and asked anybody could tell him what name of the star. then all of us started to pay attention to the star, which was alreay the brightest star and becoming brighter and brigher, bigger and bigger. we were all so excited about what we saw. we guessed it maybe was a falling star, but maybe not because falling star just exists for a few seconds then be burned out, and this star had been there for almost 3 minutes since we started to pay attention to it. while we were disscussing about it, the star became even bigger and brighter and suddenly it burst. we saw that in the central it was still shining,  and around the central it was something like nebula, expanding all around in a very high speed and soon covered half of the sky and the central started to get grey till it dispeared with only nebula left.
anybody can tell me what exactly i saw?
content.summary: Ufo bombing.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to find two brilliant objects which seemed to be stars. i noticed that these objects were much brighter than any other stars in the sky. i called my wife out to look at them. she mentioned that they were directly over each other and differed in size. i went in to get my video camera. i taped for about ten minutes and in that ten minutes the two objects seemed to move apart in distance. then the top object seemed to get further and further away. at points the top object completely disappeared. when you zoomed in on the objects that looked like stars from a distance; they looked like spheres that were slowly rotating. after approximately 10 minutes i went in to grab my coat. i walked in, grabbed my coat, walked back out and they were gone. my wife and mother in law about 5 minutes later went back out and they were back but only for a few moments. i then witnessed two aircrafts flying low in the area where the objects had appeared. they were flying right on top of eachother in different directions.
content.summary: Two bright sphere like objects aligned over top of each other in se sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Venus- in ophiuchus shine brighter as it slowly climbs away from the sun and closer to jupiter. setting well after full dark. venus, jupiter and a 3 day old moon will put on a beautiful show on the last day of november and the first day of december. have your cameras ready! keep an eye on venus and her phases too, she will be moving from gibbous to a quarter phase in january. -3.9 mag (1st) to -4.0 mag (21st) 
mars- too close to the sun for most viewers. mars is in conjunction with the sun on dec 5th, not to be seen again until 2009! 1.5 (1st) to 1.5 mag (21st) 

jupiter- in sagittarius. still a fantastic early evening object makes a wonderful pairing with venus and the moon at the end of this month and the beginning of the next. -2.1 mag (1st) to -2.0 mag (21st) 

http://astronomy.Libsyn.Com/index.Php?Post_id=399309
content.summary: Looks like a planet

content.detailedDescription: I have further to investigate, but i see a bright "star" in the southeastern sky that looks like a planet.  i view the evening skies every night and am accustomed to seeing at least one "planetary star", but this one directly below the one i usually see.  it hasn't moved.  just thought it was peculiar that it appeared suddenly tonight.  apparently, i am not the only one to notice.  others have called into mufon reporting it, as i called as well.  while the "usual star" gets obscured by the clouds, the other one below it seems to brighten intensely as the other one dims.  hmmm...
content.summary: Looks like bright planet just below another lesser bright planet, se sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home getting ready for bed and when i had turned the light off, i noticed an object that looked similar to a star, but it seemd to have a pulsating flash to it.  i have seen this before, so i knew what it could be. i went and got my binoculars and looked at it for a long time.  through the binoculars, i saw an object that had red and green lights that seemed to be pulsating around this object. it was mostly stationary, but moved sightly and after awhile went behind some trees. i was still watching it and every now and then i could see it moving behing the trees.
my feelings about seeing it was of awe and fear. after watching it for a long time, i went to bed and felt a little uneasy knowing they were out there and wondered if they knew i was watching them.

i have seen these things off and on since i was a child.
content.summary: Looked like a flashing star.

content.detailedDescription:
When i first arrived in view of the metropolis i was looking out and down from a window hovering above��������� the room i was in was completely dark and i was alone. looking out and down i saw a city that was larger than any city i���������d ever seen before. i noticed that all the structures seemed to circle in towards the center. it was huge expansive intricately embroidered with technical diversity��������� architecturally abstruse at its center the buildings were opaque blackened not unlike crystal formation��������� extending to odd heights and angles. out from the center the architecture started to blend into buildings of mason stone and steel. as i looked closer i started to notice that there were long white cylinder trains that spiraled in and out from the city center���������in this city there were no cars. at this moment of realization that this city is absent of cars and all the cities i know are completely infested by them i questioned: where am i. i observed deeper into the city. i was amazed by the diversity of structures and marveled at the silhouettes of the people in motion. it was truly immense.  i moved away from the window trying now   to adjust my vision inwards this darkened room, i moved with my hands sweeping the area in front of me trying to feel something��������� arriving with my palms flat on a wall that echoed ever so faintly with the rhythm of motion.  i let my hands guide me through the dark following the smooth wall until i arrived back to the window where i looked out once more. it appeared that in my absence from the window we had gained some elevation.   i could now see that the city was in fact circular with a diameter approximately ten miles across and that the entire inner city was environed by a garden/green belt maybe one mile wide.    in this green belt i saw pebbled pathways, sculpted gardens and the like��������� with the faint details of people in motion. the trains continued to spiral outwards/inwards missing this area all together.  just then we gained more elevation and i could see for miles now. out from this green belt was what appeared to be the agricultural belt��������� it was by far the largest area of the metropolis approximately twenty miles wide extending the entire perimeter of the whole��������� lakes and streams were in abundance���������i could see greenhouses, open farmlands��������� grain and orchard. in other areas there were cattle grazing, horses, and other livestock. the trains continued their spiral inwards/outwards towards the last perimeter of the whole.  the entire area was environed by what appeared to be a brick building approximately ten stories high. i could only guess that this is where some of the people lived as well as where some of the goods were stored and i could only imagine how well these people lived. beyond the outer building that enclosed the metropolis within there was the natural landscapes, forests, and terrain.  how amazing the view out this one window could be i was completely overwhelmed. i imagined for a moment the wealth and pride each member of this society must enjoy as they looked out their windows each day. out one side they could see the wilderness beyond and out the other they looked into their farmlands towards their city center. beyond the city heading off in straight lines through the forests i saw the faint detail of the trains heading out towards other circular cites in the distance, and beyond the horizon.. 
you see our cities are circular as are the crafts we fly.
content.summary: Contactee/abductee
